perturbation.original_text: The term of this Agreement (the "Term") shall commence on the Effective Date and conclude on October 31, 2010, unless renewed by  agreement or sooner terminated in accordance with this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: The term of this Agreement (the "Term") shall commence on the Effective Date and conclude on October 31, 2010. The term can only be extended via a written agreement signed no less than 30 days before the scheduled expiry date. Any other extensions are automatically voided.
perturbation.explanation: This introduces a contradiction in the term extension process. The original states it can be renewed by agreement, while the modified text introduces conditions on the agreement, which may conflict with general agreement principles outlined elsewhere.

perturbation.original_text: Either party may terminate this Agreement immediately if the other party (i) files a petition commencing a voluntary case under the  Bankruptcy Code; (ii) makes a general assignment for the benefit of creditors; (iii) admits in writing its inability to pay its debts as they become  due; (iv) seeks, consents to or acquiesces in the appointment of any trustee, receiver or liquidator of it or any part of its property; or (v) has  commenced against it an involuntary case under the Bankruptcy Code or a proceeding under any receivership, composition, readjustment,  liquidation, insolvency, dissolution or like law or statute, which case or proceeding is not dismissed or vacated within sixty (60) days.
perturbation.changed_text: Either party may terminate this Agreement immediately if the other party (i) files a petition commencing a voluntary case under the  Bankruptcy Code; (ii) makes a general assignment for the benefit of creditors; (iii) admits in writing its inability to pay its debts as they become  due; (iv) seeks, consents to or acquiesces in the appointment of any trustee, receiver or liquidator of it or any part of its property; or (v) has  commenced against it an involuntary case under the Bankruptcy Code or a proceeding under any receivership, composition, readjustment,  liquidation, insolvency, dissolution or like law or statute. However, termination under subsections (i)-(v) will only be enacted with a 30-day written notice to the other party.
perturbation.explanation: The original text says either party may terminate the agreement immediately under the specified conditions. The modification adds a 30-day written notice requirement, thus contradicting the immediacy of the termination.

perturbation.original_text:
All notices provided herein shall be in writing and are effective upon receipt if hand delivered, sent by overnight courier (with ability to  confirm receipt), by fax or by registered or certified mail, return receipt requested, addressed to the respective parties hereto as follows:

Either party may change its address for notice by giving written notice to the other party.
perturbation.changed_text:
All notices provided herein shall be in writing and are effective upon sending if hand delivered, sent by overnight courier (with ability to  confirm receipt), by fax or by registered or certified mail, return receipt requested, addressed to the respective parties hereto as follows:

Either party may change its address for notice by giving written notice to the other party, which will be effective 30 days after the notice is given.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states notices are effective upon 'receipt', whereas the modified text states they are effective upon 'sending'. This change introduces ambiguity because it is no longer clear at what time the notice takes effect, causing issues regarding deadlines and responses.
